translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I pass into the hands of Your Lordship Gomes Porto, Justice of the Peace of Santa Maria, the enclosed ordinance. By the office of Your Lordship

The ordinance and the same office conclusively show who are the influential ones, and almost all have been pardoned by the government. To the Most Excellent Bento Manuel and to Your Lordship

Since they fall into the power of Your Lordship Gomes Porto in the attached office, Your Lordship of February 5 of the current year, because almost all have been prisoners and pardoned, and are found in the circumstances marked by the same decree.

God keep Your Lordship Secretary of War Affairs in Caçapava, December 19, 1839. Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Answered on the 22nd of the current month.
